The Reds have lost four of their last five night games against AL Central opponents following a win.
The Reds have failed to cover the run line in six of their last seven games against AL Central opponents.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Each of the Reds' last four road games against American League opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Each of the Twins' last three games have gone OVER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Reds' last seven road games.
